rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with a seating area and traditional decorative elements inspired by Nalukettu style. Ample natural light through openings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style kitchen with functional layout, ensuring ventilation according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room and kitchen; designed for communal dining with natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Larger bedroom on the ground floor with traditional Kerala architecture elements such as wooden shutters and decorative motifs.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with a calming ambiance and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Guest room with a traditional Kerala finish, ensuring privacy while adhering to Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Ground floor bathroom with tiled flooring and ventilation as per local building norms.
